title: Week ahead: markets fixate on Fed officials
text:
Week ahead: markets fixate on Fed officials 3:41am IST - 01:52 
With global stock markets smashing record after record last week, the December minutes from the Federal Reserve hardly appeared on many traders' radars. But this week, FOMC thinking will loom large amid a slew of US central banker appearances. David Pollard reports.   
With global stock markets smashing record after record last week, the December minutes from the Federal Reserve hardly appeared on many traders' radars. But this week, FOMC thinking will loom large amid a slew of US central banker appearances. David Pollard reports.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/01/07/week-ahead-markets-fixate-on-fed-officia?videoId=380457699&videoChannel=104
